name: THEM
tag_list: web-design, website-development, seo, sem, beijing, shanghai, china, google, baidu
overview:
THEM is a web design and marketing company having Chinese market knowledge and expertise, and offering:

  • Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
  • Web Design
  • Web Development
  • Search Engine Marketing (SEM)

After its establishment in 2007, the company quickly expanded, becoming a multicultural and multilingual company employing over 30 people from Europe, Asia and North America.

THEM specializes in SEO for China, especially SEO for Google, Baidu and Bing. The company has native English, Chinese, French, Russian, and Spanish SEO specialists.
